mean_cn: n. 占星学，占星术，星座
mean_en: the study of how the positions of the stars and movements of the planets have a supposed influence on events and on the lives and behavior of people
word_etyma: astro星 + logy名词后缀：...学 → astrology 占星术
sentence: I believe in astrology. I think the stars influence my destiny.
sentence_trans: 我相信占星术，并且认为行星会影响我的命运。
